abstract.p: Correction of Oct 9 article on Hillel Lieberman, American-born Jewish settler killed in Mideast, which misidentified him as cousin of Sen Joseph I Lieberman; Sen Lieberman says they are not related

block.p: An article on Monday about an American-born Jewish settler killed in the Mideast last weekend misidentified him as a cousin of Senator Joseph I. Lieberman. The man, Hillel Lieberman, was found slain near Nablus, on the West Bank. Senator Lieberman said yesterday, after speaking to the man's father in New York, that the father's information about a relationship with the senator was apparently incorrect. Further developments are reported today on Page A10.
